meta: Requestly is free for students and educators. Available on Chrome, Firefox & Edge. Reqeustly desktop app can be used on Safari & other desktop apps.

formHeader: Get access to the free Requestly Education plan
formSupportingDocText: Any documnet that verfies you are either a student or an educator

meta: Requestly is free for opensource community. Available on Chrome, Firefox & Edge. Reqeustly desktop app can be used on Safari & other desktop apps.

formHeader: Get the free Requestly open-source plan for your organization

meta: Requestly provides 50% discount to non-profits. Available on Chrome, Firefox & Edge. Reqeustly desktop app can be used on Safari & other desktop apps.
sectionTitle: Requestly is at 50% discount for non-profits
formHeader: Get the Requestly non-profit plan for your organization at a special price
